name: Notion Finance Tracker
description: Introducing the ultimate finance tracker on Notion - a comprehensive tool that will help you take control of your finances and achieve your financial goals. With this finance tracker, you'll have all the features you need to manage your money and stay on track with your budget.Features:- Total Balance: View your account balances all in one place.- Bill tracker: Keep track of all your bills and due dates in one place.- Budget tracker: Set up your budget and track your spending to ensure you stay
